# Bcrypt Generator

Bcrypt hash generator

## Online Tool

Use this tool online at **[DevTools.at](https://devtools.at/tools/bcrypt-generator)** - Free, fast, and no registration required!

## Installation

```bash
pip install devtools_bcrypt
```

## Usage

```python
from devtools_bcrypt import process, encode, decode

# Process input
result = process("your input here")

# Encode
encoded = encode("data to encode")

# Decode
decoded = decode("data to decode")
```

## Features

- Simple, clean API
- No external dependencies
- Works with Python 3.8+
